section.heading: Confidentiality of records.
section.text: The provisions of §§ 16-2332 and 16-2333 shall apply to all juvenile case records and juvenile social records as defined therein which are created pursuant to the proceedings under this subchapter.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: Sept. 23, 1977, D.C. Law 2-22, title IV, § 410, 24 DCR 3341
